item.title: A pothole in road problem, 3rd February
item.description:

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 3rd February
item.description:
I am a resident in Staverton, and among several disabled people, who needs to use the Old Gloucester Rd (B4634) in order to get to the bus stop at Bamfurlong Junction. I am writing to please ask for something to be done about the flooding that keeps occurring at the bottom of the road. The path is unaccessible for a large portion, requiring me to walk on the road for corners that are not easy to, see round. This water, once up, stays for a very long time and the slightest additional rain makes it worse.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several potholes, 3rd February
item.description:
As you exiit out of Brymore Avenue onto New Barn Lane o the B4075 heading up the hill towards the brow of the hill heading to the racecourse, there are multiple potholes that are of a dangerous depth. Cars are having to swerve to avoid, crossing over to the other side of the road at times.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Brymore Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep crevice in the road, 3rd February
item.description:
Roughly outside number 18 there is a deep crevice / crack across the road as you head towards Hucclecote Lane. Hit this on a bike and it almost caused me to lose control and fall off.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Colwell Avenue, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
